mapper.select: SELECT interim_report_id, proposal_id, student_id, advisor_id, interim_report_file_id, status, submitted_at, updated_at, deleted FROM interim_reports WHERE deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interim_reports (proposal_id, student_id, advisor_id, interim_report_file_id, status, submitted_at, updated_at, deleted) VALUES (#{proposalId}, #{studentId}, #{advisorId}, #{interimReportFileId}, #{status}, #{submittedAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{deleted})
